screen_design_ref: Figure 16.1: Player Data Analytics Dashboard Layout
description: Verify that the Player Data Analytics page loads correctly when accessing /admin/player-analytics with authenticated admin user
scenario: Admin user navigates to the player analytics dashboard to view comprehensive player engagement and learning metrics
expected_results: Display the complete analytics dashboard with general usage stats, retention rates, engagement quality, level completion, and weekly trends
procedure:
1. Login with admin user credentials (is_admin=True)
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/admin/player-analytics
3. Verify page loads completely
4. Check page title displays 'Player Data Analytics - Phalanx Cyber Academy Admin'
5. Verify dashboard header with title and navigation buttons
6. Check all analytics sections are visible and properly styled
7. Verify responsive layout and gradient background

description: Verify player analytics page requires proper admin authentication and redirects non-admin users
scenario: Non-admin user or unauthenticated user attempts to access player analytics dashboard
expected_results: Redirect non-admin users to home page with access denied message
procedure:
1. Ensure user is logged out
2. Navigate to http://localhost:5000/admin/player-analytics
3. Verify redirect to login page
4. Login with regular user credentials (is_admin=False)
5. Navigate to analytics page
6. Verify 'Access denied. Admin privileges required.' message
7. Check redirect to home page
8. Test admin_required decorator functionality

description: Verify analytics page integrates correctly with data_analytics.py backend logic
scenario: Analytics dashboard displays data from data_analytics.py route with proper dummy data generation
expected_results: All analytics data reflects the dummy data structure defined in the backend route
procedure:
1. Verify general_stats data structure matches dashboard display
2. Check gameplay_stats integration for level completion and interaction metrics
3. Test engagement_stats display for NPS score and ratings
4. Verify cybersec_stats integration for security-specific metrics
5. Check weekly_trends data integration with Chart.js
6. Test data serialization for JSON template rendering
7. Verify all statistics calculations are accurate
8. Check data type consistency between backend and frontend
9. Test error handling for missing or invalid data
10. Verify template variable substitution works correctly

description: Verify analytics dashboard is responsive across different screen sizes
scenario: Admin accesses analytics dashboard on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices
expected_results: Dashboard adapts properly to different screen sizes while maintaining functionality
procedure:
1. Navigate to analytics dashboard on desktop (1920x1080)
2. Verify max-width constraint (max-w-7xl) and grid layouts
3. Resize browser to tablet size (768px width)
4. Check stats grid changes (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4)
5. Verify header layout adapts (flex-col sm:flex-row)
6. Resize to mobile size (375px width)
7. Check level completion grid adapts (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-5)
8. Test chart responsiveness and scaling
9. Verify quick stats grid responsiveness (grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3)
10. Test landscape and portrait orientations

description: Verify all displayed analytics data matches the dummy data structure from backend
scenario: Analytics dashboard reflects accurate dummy data for demonstration purposes
expected_results: All statistics and metrics match the values defined in data_analytics.py
procedure:
1. Compare displayed DAU (847) with general_stats.dau value
2. Verify WAU (3,421) matches general_stats.wau
3. Check MAU (12,156) corresponds to general_stats.mau
4. Verify session length conversion (30.8m from 1847 seconds)
5. Check retention rates match general_stats.retention_rates values
6. Verify NPS score (42) and average rating (4.2) display correctly
7. Check level completion rates match gameplay_stats.levels_completed
8. Verify security metrics match cybersec_stats values
9. Test weekly trends data accuracy in chart
10. Check all percentage calculations and conversions
